Brumby Hall Park, Scunthorpe Prizes - 1st £12, 2nd £8, 3rd £6, 4th £4, 5th £2. March contest - 1st(£1) Dannemora, 2nd(10s.) Rothwell Temperance. Contest promoted by Scunthorpe Agricultural Society.
